content.thinking: Let me analyze this document carefully to properly classify it. First, I'll extract all the readable text: The document is titled "CERTIFICADO DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" (Certificate of Shareholding Composition). The document shows that Henry Antonio Alterio González (ID CC 79694634) is representing ECOSIMPLE SAS (NIT 900365151-5). He certifies under oath that the associates, partners, or shareholders who have more than 5% participation in the company's capital are listed in the document. In the table, there is only one shareholder listed: - Name: HENRY ANTONIO ALTERIO GONZÁLEZ - ID: 79694634 - Participation in capital: 100% The document was completed on February 27, 2023. The document is signed by the legal representative, Henry Antonio Alterio González. Now, let me classify this document according to the defined categories: 1. Is this BLANK? No, it contains meaningful content. 2. Is this LINK_ONLY? No, it's not primarily hyperlinks. 3. Is this CECRL? No, this is not a personal identification document. While it mentions an individual, it's in the context of company representation, not personal identification. 4. Is this RUT? No, this is not a tax registration document issued by DIAN. 5. Is this CERL? No, this is not a certificate of legal existence and representation issued by a Chamber of Commerce. 6. Is this ACC? Yes, this document meets the criteria for an ACC: - It's titled "CERTIFICADO DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" (Certificate of Shareholding Composition) - It explicitly states shareholding/ownership percentages (100% for Henry Antonio Alterio González) - It identifies the owner with name and ID number - It's certified by the legal representative - Its main purpose is to document the ownership structure of ECOSIMPLE SAS 7. Is this RUB? No, this is not a DIAN report about beneficial owners. Therefore, this document is clearly an ACC (Certificado de Composición Accionaria). It focuses on documenting the ownership structure of ECOSIMPLE SAS, showing that Henry Antonio Alterio González owns 100% of the company's shares.
